div.p: Maps of Wytham Woods showing the locations and budburst timing of all trees in 2013 and 2014 for (a) oak ( N = 196), (b) ash ( N = 195), (c) beech ( N = 71), (d) birch ( N = 96), (e) hazel ( N = 156), (f) sycamore ( N = 111). Marker color indicates ranked budburst date binned into five quartiles (blue–red denotes early–late)
